alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles north of Hartford to 5 miles south of Midland. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Mansfield... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Patterson... Arkola... Liberty... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
